title: bookmark toolbar empty after session restore in linux
content:
Hi,

I'm using Linux (openSuSE 15.6, latest updates). The system has multiple monitors and for daily work I've two instances of FF running - on every monitor a different one.

After login both instances will be started simultaneously and try to access the bookmarks configuration. This simultaneous access seems to prevent the bookmarks configuration to be loaded. Instead, FF informs that bookmarks shall be loaded from some place.

This behavior should be corrected.

TIA

title: Passkey QR Code doesn't appear as expected.
content:
When trying to log into my work Microsoft Office 365 account on Firefox, a QR Code is supposed to appear, which I scan with my phone and the MSFT Authenticator app logs me in. This doesn't happen in Firefox but instead says, "Touch your security key to continue with login.microsoft.com. I am not using a security key and they are not allowed by my work. This works fine on Chrome based browsers.

Is there some setting that will fix this or is this a bug with Firefox?

title: Firefox logs me out from sites
content:
Hi, After the latest update, I experienced unusual Firefox behavior. When I turn off PC Firefox signs me out from all sites and when I open them it also requires me to accept cookies again (on any site, even when I visited it in the previous session). I thought that the update accidentally turned on the option to delete cookies after closing Firefox, but I still have this option unchecked in settings. I can also still se all my previous cookies in settings. Passwords are also still saved in Firefox password manager. The PC is new (3 months) so I don't expect it to have memory problems.

Should I go back to the older version of Firefox? Any help will be appreciated. Thanks

System: Windows 11 Pro 25H2, Firefox 146.0 (20251205151434), I don't use any Add-ons

title: Kundali Making & Kundli Analysis by Date of Birth Guide
content:
In Indian astrology, your birth details are far more than numbers on paper; they map out your life. Career growth taps into marriage timings, health itself; spiritual consciousness begins with [[Kundali Making|https://www.acharyainduprakash.com/blog/kundali-making/]]. Drawing out and analysing these details gives a powerful direction to decisions in one's life once some learned hand has set eyes on it.

The present guide will tell you how Kundli Making by Date of Birth operates, why it calls for accuracy in its best form, and how analysis by experts such as Acharya Indu Prakash Ji brings clarity and a sense of direction to a person's life. Kundli Making: Fundamental to Astrology The birth chart is prepared with the technique of Kundli making on the basis of the date, time, and place of your birth. The above chart reflects the exact position of the planet at the point when you are born. Sound preparation of a Kundli intends to: Apprehend your natural strengths and weaknesses Your career and financial potential Your marriage and relationship patterns Health tendencies and life challenges

On that note, kundli making should never be treated as something generic. They differ from one person to the other, which should be left for resolution by an expert astrologer. Kundli Making by Date of Birth: Why Precision Matters Kundli Making by Date of Birth becomes really effective only when the birth time is accurate. Even a difference of a few minutes can change planetary houses, yogas, and future predictions. An expert will not just generate a chart. They Will: Check planetary positions Analyse dashas and transits Link planetary configurations with actual events Such depth ensures the guidance is not vague but pragmatic. Janam Kundali Making: Understanding Your Life Blueprint Janam Kundali signifying the soul's journey through this life; some situations recur, some relationships feel karmic, some areas become extremely easy to succeed in, while others are not quite so.

With Janam Kundali Making, you can come to know about: Your purpose in life and karma teachings Timing of marriage and career changes Challenging and developmental times Spiritual leanings and corrective actions It goes beyond prediction and focuses on self-awareness. Kundli Analysis: From Prediction to Practical Solutions Often, people think that an analysis of one's kundli is supposed to predict the future. In reality, though, remedying is where the real value lies.

A thorough analysis of a kundli reveals:

Doshas: Their location and effects Obstacles in career and financial status Difficulties in relationships Weaknesses in health

And, even more importantly, the corresponding pancharatna remedy, be it mantras, pujas, yantras, gemstones, or lifestyle adjustments, that will align the person with the planetary energies. Live India TV Bhavishyavani: Why Acharya Indu Prakash Ji Holds National Trust India TV Bhavishyavani Live has been a reliable channel for astrological guidance for several years, owing to the accuracy and clarity of Acharya Indu Prakash Ji.

He has certain distinguishing features: Decades of experience in practical astrology Clear and rationale-based discussions without fear-based predictions Simple, effective, and principled remedies Proficient understanding of Vedic astrology and karmas His predictions are not just famous; they have a heavy influence on the ground. Acharya Indu Prakash Ji's Services & Astrology Products Acharya Ji provides you with complete astrological solutions according to your individual kundlis.

Tailored Services Detailed Kundali-Making & kundli analysis Career, marriage, and business consultation Dosha identification and remedies Yearly and life-phase predictions Astrology Products Energised yantras Certified gemstones

Spiritual remedies according to your Janam Kundali

All recommendations are made after analysing your chart—nothing generic, nothing forced. Why Expert Kundali Making Is Preferable to Automated Reports While something online could generate charts, it might lack the capability to: Understand your emotional patterns Make correlations of planetary movements with your lived experiences Describe remedies that suit your lifestyle

An expert astrologer reads between the planetary lines; such is the beginning of real guidance. Book An Appointment With The World’s Best Astrologer, Acharya Indu Prakash Ji When you stand on the fence of confusion regarding career or marriage, finance, or even a personal dilemma, your answers lie somewhere in your great big sky of kundli. All you need is the right one who can offer proper guidance in understanding them.

Schedule your appointment today with the world’s best astrologer,Acharya Indu Prakash Ji Accurate Kundali Making & Kundli Analysis by Date of Birth Make decisions luminously with deep insight.

Your kundli does not mean fate; it is about understanding the right timing and the right road.

title: A specific website will not load, Console identifies a Cross Origin Request Blocked error
content:
A website that I have used for years to track my wine cellar invenory has ceased functioning for me. The Web Designer tells me that the problem is a network issue and not his problem. I get no solutions from my ISP.

When I attempt to load the page and look at the Console I get the following error message in response to several GET requests:

Cross-Origin Request Blocked: The Same Origin Policy disallows reading the remote resource at https://cdn.ct-static.com/dist/js/ct.min.1530c2da96.js.

A web search tells me that this policy is a browser safety net. Any suggestions for troubleshooting?

title: Pinned and not pinned tabs reset upon closing
content:
Hi guys,

Just yesterday I had everything working fine, and today out of nowhere any time I close my browser trough X it resets back to default page and all my pinned browsers or unpinned just disappear.. It works with exiting trought shortcut or meniu, but it little annoying, I tried solutions provided in the treads but is there no way to revert back to just using X for exiting and have your previously closed tabs saved and restored upon opening app again?

There was no updates installed or any other changes made to my pc today. So it is very strange why out of the blue its like this right now.

I tried: 1. Troubleshoot mode (did not work) 2.I tried exiting trought shortcut/meniu exit (worked but not prefered solution as it will be very easly forgotten for split second and all tabs open will reset) 3. Tried unchecking reseting firefox and checking the box again (did not work)

Lost at this stage as I really loved using Firefox.
